name: whats-good
description: This is a full stack app

scripts.start: cd frontend && npm i --legacy-peer-deps && npm start
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd backend && npm run watch" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install: cd backend && npm i --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm i --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install npm && run build
